constraints.name: boundary_constraint
constraints.description: 球在网格内移动，不能移出边界

constraints.name: random_walk
constraints.description: 球的移动是随机游走，方向概率固定且相同

constraints.name: initial_position
constraints.description: 球从顶部某一个空格随机均匀地发射

constraints.name: max_steps_bound
constraints.description: 球在击中目标前访问的空间数量平均不超过 10^9
